script.name: plugin.loadoutm.mainmenu
script.description: Loadout Manager: Main Menu event scripts
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds'
*do if $a.event != [MEvent.IsDisabled] AND $a.event != 'ishidden' *write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='LoadoutManager, event=%s, data=%s', $a.event, $a.data, null, null, null
$HQ = get player HQ
$settings = get global variable: name='loadout.manager.settings'
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $settings = get global variable: name='loadout.manager.settings' if not $settings $settings = table alloc set global variable: name='loadout.manager.settings' value=$settings end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Search] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $value = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' OR $menu.id == 'loadout.edit.selectware' OR $menu.id == 'loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret else if $menu.id == 'loadout.mainmenu' set global variable: name='loadout.manager.search' value=$value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Selection] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.TradeBarCh] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadout.mainmenu' if $selection == 'loadout.shiplist' $loadout.id = get global variable: name='loadoutmenu.id' START $value ->open menu script: script=plugin.loadoutm.viewmenu, value=$loadout.id else if $selection == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$selection Data=$a.data gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Hotkey] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' OR $menu.id == 'loadout.edit.selectware' OR $menu.id == 'loadoutm.edit.selectcmd' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'loadout.mainmenu' if $value == 'view' START [NULL] ->open menu script: script=plugin.loadoutm.viewmenu, value=$selection else if $value == 'apply' set global variable: name='loadoutmenu.id' value=$selection gosub sub.ShipListMenu return $input else if $value == 'edit' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=[MEvent.Start] Data=$selection return $ret end else if $menu.id == 'loadoutm.editmenu' @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script plugin.loadoutm.editmenu : Object=$a.obj Event=$a.event Data=$a.data return $ret end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='loadoutmenu.shiptype' value=null set global variable: name='loadoutmenu.id' value=null set global variable: name='loadout.manager.search' value=null end return null
sub.ShipListMenu: $loadout.id = get global variable: name='loadoutmenu.id' $shiptype = $HQ ->get HQ loadout type: id=$loadout.id $loadout.name = $HQ ->get HQ loadout name: id=$loadout.id
$ships = get ship array: of race Player class/type=$shiptype if $ships skip if size of array $ships $ships = null end
$menu = create custom menu array
if not $ships $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3032 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text set menu option: $menu, no select lines=[TRUE] else $ships = sort array $ships $i = 0 $size = size of array $ships while $i < $size $ship = $ships[$i] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$ship returnvalue=$ship inc $i = end end
set menu option: $menu, icon=55
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=686 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $shiptype, null, null, null $input = create input: id='loadout.shiplist' menu=$menu title=$text description=$loadout.name callback=null endsub
sub.BuildMenu: $search.filter = get global variable: name='loadout.manager.search' $settings.isclosed = $settings['isclosed'] if not $settings.isclosed $settings.isclosed = table alloc $settings.isclosed['isclosed'] = $settings.isclosed end
$menu = create custom menu array
$drawn.any = [FALSE]
$HQ = get player HQ if $HQ -> exists $loadout.types = $HQ ->get HQ loadout types $loadout.types = sort array $loadout.types
$size = size of array $loadout.types $i = 0 while $i < $size $type = $loadout.types[$i] inc $i =
@ $array.sorted = $HQ -> call script lib.cycrow.sortloadouts : Ship Type=$type Search Filter=$search.filter $loadout.count = size of array $array.sorted if $loadout.count $is.open = [TRUE] do if $settings.isclosed[$type] $is.open = [FALSE] $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $type, $loadout.count, null, null, null add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$text, open=$is.open, id=$type, indent=20
$loadout.i = 0 while $loadout.i < $loadout.count $loadout = $array.sorted[$loadout.i] inc $loadout.i = $loadout.name = $HQ ->get HQ loadout name: id=$loadout $context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3033 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=153, returnvalue='view', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3034 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=41, returnvalue='edit', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3035 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=2, returnvalue='apply', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3036 add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$loadout.name $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$loadout, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$loadout.name returnvalue=$ret $drawn.any = [TRUE] end
add end grouping to menu: $menu end end end
if not $drawn.any $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end
set menu option: $menu, icon=153 set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE]
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3031 $callback = [Callback.Group] $input = create input: id='loadout.mainmenu' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$HQ callback=$callback endsub return null

line.comment: *write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Debug], fmt='LoadoutManager, event=%s, data=%s', $a.event, $a.data, null, null, null

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu item to array
add context menu global info line: menu=
create menu return value: context menu, id=
add custom menu item to array

sval.val: Loadout Manager: Main Menu event scripts
